origin.meta_origin: A unique creation of Korean Wuxia (not historical like White Lotus/Ming Cult).
origin.narrative_purpose: Created to be a 'True Evil' distinct from the 'Might makes Right' philosophy of the Demonic Cult (Magyo).

location.nature: Hidden / Parasitic. No fixed base is standard; they hide within society or deep underground caverns filled with blood pools.
location.strategy: Infiltration and corruption rather than open territorial rule.

ideology.belief: Power is obtained through blood (absorption) and sacrifice (human offering), not just training.

contrast_with_magyo.Magyo: Worships Strength (Survival of the Fittest), Rational Evil, Martial Perfection.
contrast_with_magyo.Hyeolgyo: Worships Blood/Entity (Fanaticism), Irrational Evil, Shortcuts via Sacrifice.

mechanics: Vampirism (흡혈): Absorbing blood/essence (Gi) to increase internal energy rapidly.
Human Sacrifice (인신공양): Killing masses to summon entities or power up rituals.
Resilience: Hard to kill due to forbidden regenerative arts (sometimes portrayed as undead-like).

visuals.qi_color: Crimson / Blood Red (Blood fog, smell of iron).

signature_ultimate.name: 혈마오검 (Blood Demon Five Swords / 血魔五劍)
signature_ultimate.description: The supreme sword art of the Blood Demon (Leader). Blood spurts with every swing.

list: 마라혈해공 (Mara Blood Sea Art) - Accumulating Qi like a sea of blood.
성혈금침대법 (Holy Blood Gold Needle Great Art) - Forcing potential or controlling puppets.
대천신혈마강림대법 (Great Heavenly God Blood Demon Descent) - Summoning/Transformation ritual.
천독화혈독인대법 (Heavenly Poison Melting Blood Poison Man Art) - Creating biological weapons.

narrative_role: A faction that unites the Orthodox and Demonic Cults against a common, disgusting enemy.
The source of 'Corrupted' storylines where good characters are turned into blood-craving monsters.
An enemy that provides a moral justification for the protagonist to use extreme violence.
